vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
VaultAdminStorage.admin should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#278)
VaultAdminStorage.pendingAdmin should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#283)
VaultAdminStorage.pendingVaultImplementation should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#293)
VaultAdminStorage.vaultImplementation should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#288)
VaultStorage._notEntered should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#304)
VaultStorage.accAtlantisPerShare should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#310)
VaultStorage.atlantisBalance should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#307)
VaultStorage.atlantisStore should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#301)
VaultStorage.pendingRewards should be constant (VaultStorage.sol#313)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in VaultStorage.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (VaultStorage.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (VaultStorage.sol#192): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (VaultStorage.sol#271): it allows old versions

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
